actions.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.3059.

official_title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey for scrapping to the Mariners' Museum in Newport News, Virginia, a vessel in the National Defense Reserve Fleet that is scheduled to be scrapped.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to convey to the Mariners' Museum (Newport News, Virginia) a certain National Defense Reserve Fleet vessel scheduled to be scrapped.

titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to convey for scrapping to the Mariners' Museum in Newport News, Virginia, a vessel in the National Defense Reserve Fleet that is scheduled to be scrapped.
